rooms.description: A welcoming space with built-in storage and display areas.
Spacious living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
A dining space that overlooks the garden. Open concept design with a Vastu compliant layout for auspicious energy flow.
Modern kitchen designed with efficient workflow in mind, following Vastu principles regarding placement of cooking appliances.
A private bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. South-facing to promote positive energy.
Cozy guest room overlooking the garden with a window for natural light.
Functional space for work or study, ideally placed facing east to harness morning light.
Space for laundry and storage, positioned in the northeast area as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A grand entrance with steps leading to a landscaped garden.
Access point into the central courtyard which serves as the heart of the cottage.
Large east-facing windows in living and dining areas for natural light.
Balconies on the north side offering views of the garden and fresh air.

rooms.description: A serene sleeping area with expansive views of the garden and courtyard.
Cozy upper guest room ensuring privacy while maintaining connection to nature.
Collaborative workspace with access to the courtyard for fresh air.
Extra storage space located above utility areas, designed in keeping with Vastu norms.

openings.description: A balcony providing scenic views and natural light.
South-facing windows in bedrooms for optimum sunlight.
Floor-to-ceiling windows offering a direct view of the central courtyard.

central_courtyard.description: A spacious open-air courtyard that acts as the nucleus for natural light and ventilation in both floors.

garden.description: A large garden with a variety of greenery, designed according to Vastu principles to bring prosperity and balance.
